name: TestsForCarbapenemaseProduction
title: Tests for carbapenemase production
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting carbapenemase production),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: carbapenemase production),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
